Desc.entry: Singing group of ordinary people doing extraordinary things in exciting places. Organises choir training, culminating in performances in large renowned venues. Sings a variety of music including songs from Broadway, the movies and musicals, classics and classical rock. All abilities welcome, no auditions or experience necessary. Open to those aged 16 years and over. Branch meets weekley in Sheffield for rehersals, Sing Live Ltd will provide details of local contacts.
